author: S Mal
title: Amazing
body: I have ordered it 4 times & will continue to till 400 coz it's so good. The smell is to die for. It's so fresh ❤️

author: Ruqayyah Asiri
title: Good
body:
I purchased the small size just for trial and I'm very happy with quality of the product. I again got the bigger size i loved the packaging. 
The deodorant smells very nice and its effect last for whole day and it also moisturized the skin and give very smooth feeling of that area.
I highly recommend it

author: JB
title: A cruelty free deodorant like no other!
body: After experimenting with multiple brands, both global and local, I keep coming back to this. Best suited for the humid climate in Mumbai, all year round. No allergic reaction, long-lasting and effective. Highly recommend it.

author: Renuka Nadkarni
body: love using Jc products, they are good

author: Vidhyapriya K T
body: Awesome products and excellent service. Would love to recommend to friends and family and recommended as well

author: Vidhyalakshmi Manickavasagam
body: love using Jc products, they are good

author: S.B.
title: Amazing Deodorant
body: It does the way it is specified in the feature. It has got a wonderful fragrance which neutralises body odour. As a lactating mother I would highly recommend it. You got to see multiple changes in the body during this phase but this deodorant helps you to feel fresh

author: Jisha Ganesh
title: Light and Fragrant!
body: I have had the best experience using the deodorant. I had issues with hyperpigmentation, and after using the product for the past two months, I can see visible difference. It is light to use and lasts through the day.

author: Rithik S
title: Fragrance
body: Glad that the natural deodorant produces very cool fragnance. Loving it. Packaging can be made better.

author: Mithra Ramakrishnan
title: Excellent
body:
Very nice deodorant. I am using it for my daughter and I totally love it 
. So ordered few more items

author: Runjhun Malhotra
title: The best organic, non-toxic deo in the Indian market
body:
The deodorant stick is in sustainable packaging - no plastic on there. This is comforting as packaging and the waste it creates is a concern for me always. it glides on easy even in extreme weather conditions. Aside from this, the fragrance is just absolutely lovely! One gets a cooling sensation upon application and I have found it to provide24 hour protection from odour. 
Just LOVE Juicy Chemistry!

author: Vishruta Rahul Moondra
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: Vishruta Rahul Moondra
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: V.R.M.
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: V.R.M.
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: Ann Cheeran
body: Love the smell! Wish it was a little bigger in size though for the price.

author: Sushrut Munje Vhora
title: Loved it!
body: Smells good. Easy to use. Highly recommended.

author: R.R.
title: Great deodorant, no turning back!
body: I switched to natural deodorants way before I discovered the Juicy Chemistry deodorant. But this Blood Orange & Geranium deodorant has the best fragrance and skin-friendly feeling. Props for including baking soda among all ingredients. I'd love for JC to add some more fragrances to this line. A big thank you for launching this product in India.

author: T.M.
title: Good deodorant
body: It is a good natural deodorant, has helped keep body odour at bay. It does last a good amount of hours in the hot and humid weather of Mumbai. It does have a peculiar pain relief balm kinda smell. It doesn't bother me but I hope the scent of the product can be changed using natural ingredients.

author: G.D.
title: a must buy
body: I was on the lookout for a replacement of chemical deodorant with an organic one. Found this and tested it in summers of mumbai heat and I must say it held well from morning till evening. I was happy.

author: Krishnan HG
title: Very good
body: Its very good but i could not buy the next consignment. Its not available anymore?

author: Megha Thimmaiah
title: Blood Orange Deodorant the best ever
body: Writing the review after my 2nd purchase of blood orange roll on , the deodorant once applied in the morning stays upto evening, no sweat anymore and my underarms were dark before now i can see it is back to its original color no more darkness. I am genuinely happy with this product for life my day doesn't go without this now.

author: Vidhubala S
title: Blood orange and geranium deo
body: The deodorant is super good and the projection is nice too. Highly recommend this product.

author: Darshana Hegde
title: A fantastic deodorant!
body: That's the second time I ordered this Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant. It has a pleasant fragrance and does a great job! Especially with the sustainable packaging and no nasties ingredients, I will definitely return to this product again.

author: M.G.d.
title: packaging must improve
body: Just today got the delivery... the roll on must have some mechanism to pull it back as well. One shuld gv full concentration will Rolling it out. Otherwise the product is good. Gives a fresh feeling after applying.

author: Gagandeep Nath
title: Loved it
body: Have been using it, since the time I have bought it & also use it for my kids.

author: Siddharth Kumar
title: Great product
body: I've been allergic to most chemical based deos and this product has been a blessing. It does its job and there's absolutely no allergic reaction on the skin.

author: Anonymous
title: Most natural and one of the best deo
body:
I felt this is one of the best natural deos in the market. Fragrance is mild and effective enough for a day use. No crazy chemicals.
Thank you Juicy Chemistry for bringing natural products to home !!!

author: M.A.
title: lifesaver
body: When you sweat this thing comes to life and smells really fresh. In high heat setting or packed place this is a must.

author: Mohit Aggarwal
title: Lifesaver
body: When you sweat this thing comes to life and smells really fresh. In high heat setting or packed place this is a must.

author: Kanishka Mehta
title: PERFECT
body: The deodorant stick is fragrant and easy to use. Time to replace those alcohol loaded deodorants and perfumes with the JC organic deodorant stick. The paper packaging makes it 100% biodegradable.

author: KEDAR KARLEKAR
title: Nice and best deo
body: Best deo with very effective result .

author: Kushagra Shukla
title: Deodorant Review
body: The product is nice and the fragrance is also good but they should sell the product in a small box

author: Flavy Dmello
title: Perfect deodorant
body: It’s amazing. Perfect for underarm with good smell.

author: Prachi Deva
title: It really works!
body: I ordered a deo stick and believe you me, within one month, my underarms began to lighten up something that no other product could help me achieve! Not to mention the gentle, lingering fragrance....

author: S.B.
title: Finally a product I have been looking for...
body: After using innumerable deos I have finally the ultimate product which is nothing less than refreshing n heavenly....a must buy..!!!!!

author: A.C.
title: really good product
body: it's so refreshing and kind of my skin. smells so good. has a nice lasting effect. highly recommended.

author: Aman Sandhu
title: Very good
body: Very good product  I'm happy with the purchase.

author: A.
title: Soothing odor
body: A bit crumbly in texture but the fragrance is inviting and warm :)

author: Akhila Mutha
title: Amazing Product
body: I have been using this product since last 1 year. It totally lives up to the hype and expectations (that it states to do!) I totally recommend to try this organic product once and trust me there is no going back!

author: Rachna Tambe
title: Awesome product
body: The fragrance is just so refreshing and I have noticed visible lightening of my underarms if used regularly. Would definitely repurchase in another fragrant variant.

author: shilpa deepak
title: Awesome
body: It's really a good product and the smell is too good. Underarms feel very refreshed am totally in love with it... Tried many deos but this one is too good to fall for....

author: Shwetha Venkideswaran
title: Great Deodorant that lasts
body: Love the fragrance and it last for good time through the day. Design of the product use could have been better. But overall I will purchase the product again

author: Simona Rodrigues
title: So so !!!
body: Even though fragrant it’s not long lasting

author: B.N.
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: Have been using this regularly and my body odour has reduced drastically! My favorite JC product.

author: S.U.
title: Love the organic roll on
body: I was suffering from dark underarms after applying chemical deodrant roll ons. Post noticing the side effects, I have stopped roll ons completely until many years later when I discovered that organic roll on by Juicy Chemistry is available. I have been using the product almost daily since my purchase (2 months) and notice no sweat and fresh smell throughout the day. The smell has to be acquired as I didn't like it in the first application. I like the sustainable packaging. In summary, the product does the job without causing side effects.

author: Shradha Upadhyay
title: Love the organic underarm roll-on
body: I was suffering from dark underarms after applying chemical deodrant roll ons. Post noticing the side effects, I have stopped roll ons completely until many years later when I discovered that organic roll on by Juicy Chemistry is available. I have been using the product almost daily since my purchase (2 months) and notice no sweat and fresh smell throughout the day. The smell has to be acquired as I didn't like it in the first application. I like the sustainable packaging. In summary, the product does the job without causing side effects.

author: Akshatha MP
title: Excellent product !
body:
It's an amazing product , it works so well as a deodorant,  keeps you from sweating the whole day ! 
And it lasts for quite a long time...this is a staple in my wardrobe

author: Beinda Bajaria
title: Amazing
body: Need to get a few more bottles of hair oil to progress my hair growth ..

author: Analise Stukenborg
title: Fave
body: Love this deodorant!  Smells fantastic, works, and feels great.  I like that it is natural oil based, but doesn't leave stains.

author: Purvi Vaghela
title: Awesome profile
body: Love that it's clean, chemical free and gives amazing results. Thanks JC for all your products. I'm hooked ❤️

author: Divya Gupta
title: Efficient and Convenient
body: Simply loved it. A must have.

author: Shibani Patra
body: Nice fruity fragrance. thank you juicy chemistry

author: A.P.
title: great products
body: Thanks for providing us organic products.

author: A.P.
title: best ever deodorant
body: While looking at us uk market products like schmidt's natural .. I always thought why Indians don’t make such kind of organic products ? & finally I found this brand. Thank you for making this.

author: Priya
title: It's great
body: I was looking for an organic Deodorant from a long time, luckily found Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant. It's really good and longlasting. Thanks for coming up with such nice products.

author: Guneet
title: Excellent product!
body: I loved using the deodorants by juicy chemistry.

author: N.p.
title: very good deodorant
body: This deo is very good and its organic too, so no problems with black or dark underarms, if your underarms are dark then it is for you dears. Try just ones and you like it. It's smells like citrusy orange that's very good and refreshing. this deo is Owasome. but it's no longer staying as per my used its staying about 5-6 hours. But I like it and I love it. Thank you jc for this.

author: B.S.
title: splendid
body: I am in love with this blood orange range

author: D.R.
title: must buy
body:
I have been struggling with body odour since 10 years, no product I have used so far has come close to this deo, absolutely amazing product to deal with bad underarm smell. 
Do not hesitate a bit to buy this great formulates product. 
Thank you Juicy Chemistry 😘.
Hope you come with more fragrances. 
PS: this is my first review on all the platforms combined.

author: Neela Sapatnekar
title: Super efficient deo
body:
I am very impressed with this deo.
I have tried many other brands earlier. 
None of them match upto the performance of the Blood orange and Geranium Deodorant. 
Full 24 hours protection against BO!

author: T.B.
title: Good product except packaging
body: I find the product to be quite effective. The fragrance is also good as i personally like blood 🍊. What i don't understand is the packaging.its shown in picture as a roll on which is not how it actually is though. It's tedious process to use currently(with an applicator). For this reason alone I'll not buy it again . Clearly it makes sense to have a roll on. Hope you can come up with a viable solution for this. Otherwise no issues. It stays on for long duration.

author: Aavya Srivastava
title: Customer Satisfaction
body:
The product was very good 
I would recommend it to everyone

author: S.O.
title: Blood Orange and Geranium
body: The smell was wonderful and energizing. One of the best fragrances out there. However, the deo itself stained my clothes.

author: Sheetal Israni
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: Love the deodorant and it’s not too overpowering smell.

author: Gayathri Menon
title: excellent product
body:
It works just the way it promises to .....
This is the deodrant we have all been searching for!

author: Bhavana Asmath
body: The deo is one of the best I have used till date. Juicy chemistry never disappoints you with its products.Absolutely in love with the product.

author: Kabir Sachdeva
title: Breath of fresh air- literally
body: this is hands down only the 2 nd deodorant that has suited my sensitive skin. And it literally stays with you for  more than half a day, sometimes even more than that. the fragrance notes are so refreshing and unique, i'm absolutely in love with the peoduct.

author: lakshmi K
title: Perfect deo
body: My search for an organic deo is over!!! Thank you so much

author: Divya Jain
title: So Fresh
body: Fragrance is so good.After applying you just feel very fresh.

author: Mirunalani D
title: Lasts long!
body: The fragrance was lasting long. It did not leave any stain on the dress.

author: Joanna Ciosek
title: Very good Deo!
body: It's my 5th or 6th order for that deodorant. Very pleasent smell and natural ingriedients. I highly recommend :)

author: Vinay kumar
title: Blood orange and Geranium deodrant
body: Such a pleasant smell..My first organic deodrant.. Will order again..Had always tried those chemical based deodorant..but now this one is gonna be my favourite..Much love to juicy chemistry 😊

author: Monica Gupta
title: Best Natural Deo
body: I was looking for the natural deo for long time. I don't like using chemical based products on my skin. This one is best, gives refreshing scent and controls sweat smell. I just loved this product

author: Ancy Alex
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: A must try product from Juicy Chemistry! Brilliant!

author: K.S.
title: Deodorant
body: Well made deodorant,  like the subtle fragrance. The best natural product I feel of what I've experienced of many. The aroma stays for long. Thank yoy

author: P.C.
title: Does what it says
body: Neutralizes body odor and keeps the underarms fresh

author: N.A.
title: Best Deodrant
body: So this product is ideal for every person. Myself being an extremely sweaty person, this products helps throughout the day in the hottest days like these to stay odour free. For summers use the tub packaging while for winters the stick one is ideal. Already finished the stick one, on to trying the tub one and I am already excited.

author: Vini
title: Awesome product for sweaty people
body: Keep up the good work. Awesome product for sweaty underarms. It keeps controlling the sweat. It stays completely whole day

author: Alekhya T
title: Organic deo
body: What else u need.. Not putting alcohol in ur body n what a smell.. Very useful to use in pregnancy too as u cannot use others

author: Srilekha
title: Great deodorant
body: It has a subtle fragrance and helps me stay fresh all day!

author: Arpita Godbole
title: Best night regime.
body: This is my second order of products recommended by JC for night regime for bright and supple skin. The toner, organic facial oil and under eye roll on. All these products work fantastically together and I saw results in weeks time.

author: Priyanka Dhaval
title: As promised
body: The brand has wide range of products.all products are premium quality.

author: Elaine Dsouza
title: Good product
body: Good product...quantity should be a little more...

author: avnish mehta
title: What a true deodrant is meant to be!
body:
This is a terrific product outlining the true purpose of it's category - to deodrize.
I liked this because it delivers to what it promises and is born to do!
Definitely it should be used sparingly as the usage instructions.

author: Naveen Patel
title: Doesnt work in summer
body: Only works in winter. Summer it just smells more

author: Su Girish
title: Fab deo
body: I love the deo. It keeps my armpits dry and smelling good and all you need is a tinsy wincy bit so the roll on goes a long way.

author: Misha Agrawal
title: Loved it
body: First of all I love the packing, it eco friendly and sustainable. Secondly love the product. The deo in itself smells amazing and it's not sticky at all, feels super light and comfortable on the skin. Would definitely repurchase

author: Shivani K
title: Loove this deodarant stick
body: At first, I was skeptical and wasn't sure how this deodarant stick would turn out to be considering we are so addicted to sprays these days. But this stick is very practical, it keeps you feeling fresh and lasts long! My underarms skin tone seem to have got lighter as well. So so happy with this product!

author: Shubhashree Sangameswaran
title: Repeat buyer here
body: Smells amazing! Paper packaging is a plus :)

author: Sanmaam Shetty
title: Very good
body: Gives a lovely cooling feeling. And keep you fresh all day

author: Jyothi
title: Blood orange and Geranium deodorant
body: I love the scent and it lasts all day with gradual but minimal fade. Keeps me smelling and feeling fresh all day. Very happy with this one. One minor issue is that blood orange scent seems to be fading as I reach half the bottle. Geranium scent is still strong but can't smell blood orange as much. I love the blood orange scent more, so it getting faded in the bottle itself is a bit disappointing. But it's a good deodorant overall. The eco-friendly packaging is amazing and it works really well. It lasts 2-2.5 months too, so I'm happy.

author: Pranav P
title: Excellent Deodorant!
body: Neutralizes sweat smell all day long.

author: Sahasra Singh Singh Singh Singh Singh
title: Organic deodorant
body: It is nice and the plus point is it is organically made.

author: S.S.
title: Love it!!!
body: The best natural deodorant on the market! Smells absolutely divine. A herby scent with hints of floral. Need to reapply twice a day during summers. Do keep in mind that it isn't an antiperspirant. Highly recommend it!

author: V.N.
title: Authentic
body: Authentic scent , the quality is just perfect and the scent lasts for the whole day.

author: A.S.
title: Love it :)
body: I think its really effective in terms of body odour and also very well suited for my sensitive skin. I would really recommend it if your skin is prone to infections and sweat. Best thing to deal with hot Delhi summers.

author: S.
title: wow! surprising results
body: at first, i just ordered the deo stick as a an trial run, but was surprised by how well this has worked. there's no sticky feeling, no BO! and little goes a long way, keeps fresh all day. loved it

author: Jatin
title: I think this is a wonderful unisex product!
body: I have been using Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant through the winters and it has worked well for me. I sweat a lot. The real test will start now with the onset of summer. Fingers crossed and hoping it works well even in summers. I would describe the fragrance as a unisex fragrance.

author: A.T.
title: Refreshing
body: Refreshing, especially for the gym. Not overpowering but effective in controlling body odour.

author: Srikrishnsn D
title: Good product
body: Organic and natural product to use

author: Nichu
title: Delightful deodorant
body:
This deodorant is just amazing. I love its fresh citrusy scent that keeps me fresh surprisingly throughout the day. But, I do not sweat profusely.
I feel it moisturizes my underarms and I can feel a cooling tingling sensation for quite a while on application. 
The only con of this sustainably packaged product is that it stains your clothes.

author: A.P.
title: Best deodorant
body: This is the best deodorant stick that i have used.....will definitely repurchase

author: S.A.
title: Totally loving it
body: I started taking care of my skin and then it led to taking care of everything this organic deo controls my odour for 6-9 hours and I know this helps with my underarm darkness coz it's similar to lipbalm . I will repurchase it . Regarding the fragrance it's citrusy , floral and medicinal you have other options you can try it if you are not fan of this . My sister tried the manoranjani flower one.

author: S.M.
title: Amazing product
body: This deo is so natural I'm gonna keep coming back to repurchase this one.

author: Sylvia Prem
title: Beat of the best
body: I am absolutely in love with the results this product give. The only downside is the packaging. After screwing it up to get the product out to apply , i am unable to unscrew back the remaining product. Please improve the packaging then this is an absolute catch . Just like in all the roll on sticks bring the screw and unscrew method to make product usage effective.

author: S.S.
title: A natural deodorant that actually works!
body: gives me at least 12hrs of fresh and zesty armpits!

author: Prasanthi Malladi
title: Good
body: It has a smell of orange peel rather than orange pulp and the geranium smells like rose which I find  interesting and reduced darkness upto some extent. Packaging is a bit messy but since it is eco friendly I'm happy 😊 to deal with it.

author: Bhavya Sree
title: Body deodorant
body: It has an amazing fragrance which is long lasting like all day and it is not sticky at all...easy to carry around and eco friendly

author: Suman Nair
title: Fantastic product
body:
Hey, it’s a fantastic product with a mild smell of orange and it doesn’t irritate my skin like other products! Just wish the expiry date was a little longer than 3 months but I am still using it regularly😊
Thanks so much for this fantastic product!

author: Apurva Nayak
title: Nice
body: Long lasting, not sticky and smells good.

author: R.K.P.
title: Best deodorant available
body: Best deodorant available in Indian market. Excellent ingredients list and package quality. Ordering more.

author: Nitya Misra
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body:
I loved this product! I've been looking for something like this for years - something not too strong like regular spray deodorants that make me sneeze, and a product that won't irritate my skin.  
I'm a big fan of the citrusy scent of this one. It doesn't leave too much of a residue on the skin, and stays for a long time, making me smell fresh for the entire day. I also like how small it is, easy to carry around, and easy to apply as well! 
I'm a convert!

author: Rose
title: Deodorant blood orange and geranium
body: I love the deodorant and the fact that it is organic. Long lasting and smells good.

author: Ruchi Tiwari
body: I loved that it is so refreshing and pretty long lasting

author: Smita Rajan
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: Brightens up the day with blood Orange fragrance & lasts a long time during the day. Soothing feeling.

author: Ishmeet Kapoor
title: Something new but fresh!!!
body:
Was quite sceptical at first, but decided to give it a try.. really loved the citrusy fragrance. My underarms have never felt so fresh before and quite long lasting. The most important thing is that it is natural.
Great job guys! Wonderful product.

author: Mansi Panjwani
title: Fresh and Easy to use
body: Love the fragrance. It's fresh and works beautifully. Long lasting indeed.

author: Bennett Nirmala
title: love it
body: Love th elong lasting fragrance and easy to apply method

author: S.M.
title: Nice one
body: This deodorant smells so so good !!When applied it gives cooling sensation and amazing freshness!!

author: Chetna Nagpal
title: Blood orange deodorant
body: The only deodorant that has ever worked for me.

author: Pragya Yadav
title: Great product
body: This is the first time I tried an organic deodorant. And this one is beautiful . It smells amazing and gives a calming and cooling sensation. Would buy again .

author: P Meghana
title: Eco friendly and non toxic
body: I have searched very long to buy a deodrant which is free from nasty chemicals and i found this jc deodrant.Happy with this one.

author: Preeti Shetty
title: Deodorant
body: I ordered this Deo for my daughter ... it works great ... she smells fresh all day and feels good about herself ... she is hooked on this deo and won’t replace it with anything ...as a mom I don’t worry about the chemicals as it’s all organic ... I recommend this to everyone ... especially teenagers ...

author: Ravi S
title: Eco friendly deo stick
body: Though I don't have body odour issues so never used any deo before. But being impressed with JC products just got this to give it a try. Have a neural feeling perhaps as I don't have a reason to use deo in first place. But like the freshness on applying it post shower.

author: M.V.
title: Must have
body:
Last longer and does as it claims .. ❤️❤️❤️
Loving it

author: Naomi
title: Brilliant
body: Took a while to become effective, but never going back to regular deodorants after this.the blood orange one smells great and lasts even in the crazy humid weather of Mumbai.

author: Navneet Kaur
title: Underarm deo
body: An excellent product! I have used the blood orange one and the fragrance keeps me feeling fresh until tea time when I reapply it and get freshened until bed time. What's more, I am happy to be using a natural product and supporting a business that cares for the environment enough to be eco friendly.

author: Navya MS
title: blood orange and geranium deodorant
body: I love the product and the smell. I remain fresh the whole day with the blood orange and geranium deodorant and I love the packaging

author: Salome
title: Does the underarm blacken during transition phase
body: I’m a big fan of Juicy chemistry because of its  organic products. The products worked wonders to my acne prone skin. I ordered the deodorant too. But after applying for a week, I noticed my underarms got so blackened. Is this expected during the transition phase. Please include this in the product info

author: Siddhi Bhadgaonkar
title: Amazing product
body: The deodorant smells really very nice and is long-lasting. Also I loved it's eco-friendly packaging, really very impressive and unique.

author: Arushi Sana
title: My go-to brand for an organic and sustainable experience
body: Being a zerowaste practitioner, the compostable Juicy Chemistry deodorant was a saviour for me as I didn’t have any other plastic-free options in the market. Even the travel size is perfect and can be carried in a purse, which is great for me as I have to travel a lot.  The lip balm is great, works on hydration and pigmentation and it’s sustainably packaged in tin/reusable container. I don’t think I’m ever going to change my brand for these two things.

author: ARYAN SAHU
title: excellent frangnance
body: its smeel is awesome and its really good !

author: Anonymous
title: Worked like magic
body: I saw the results from first use itself. But waited to write a review till a week's use. Due to hectic work used to get extremely sweaty with bad odour at end of the day which was of course extremely embarrassing. Tried many anti fungal products but nothing worked. Simply saw juicy chemistry advertisement and because had very good reviews thought to give another product a try. N it really did work. Within a week no bad odour at all. It was really surprising n satisfying that finally a product that really works. Thank you juicy chemistry.

author: Sravani .
title: No bad odour
body: I have been using this deodrent from past 1month after cleansing I'm using this deodrent nice aroma,no bad odour and also no sweat. I completed my 1st one love to buy more.

author: Beena UM
title: Awesome
body: Fragrance is soothing. Both mind and body feels fresh all day.

author: Abhi Patel
title: superb
body: i love this deo..its fragrance amazing.. highly recommended it

author: nalori chakma
title: A little Orangy
body: It was nice but I should have read the Ingredients properly. It has a tangy smell to it and I am not a big fan. If you like that smell of lime and orange in your deodrant then this is for you

author: Honey Jhunjhunwala
title: One search ends here
body: Just bought my second deo stick today and the results are excellent. The fragrance is superb and so is its effect on bad sweat smell.

author: Sujata Borah
title: Blood orange and geranium deodorant stick
body: I purchased this deo for my husband and he liked it very much, does what it claims, kudos to juicy chemistry team for such this natural deodorant stick 👌👌👌

author: Ashok Kannan Venkatesan
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Vasundhara Baidya
title: It's good
body: Loved the deodorant. Really soothing. The transition period is a little time-consuming but really workout fine after that. Would love to get more floral scents like lavender and sandalwood if possible:)

author: Shubhangi Joshi
title: Pleasantly surprised!
body: This is my first time using an organic deodorant, and im so happy. Refreshing citrus fragrance and it genuinely keeps body odor away, instead of merely masking it.

author: Meenakshi Pai
title: Awesome deo stick
body: this is my repeat purchase. the fresh and uplifting scent lasts all day long, its creamy in feel. I love it, just wish they had a perfume edt/parfum in the same fragrance

author: Samhitha Reddy
title: So good!! I loved it
body: Love this deadorant stick. Although on the packaging they instructed to push the tube up lightly but it wouldn't come up, I guess it was jammed but it finally came up after trying for about 10 mins. Also for the first two days it was stinging a bit but then it subsided on the third day. They did mention on the packaging that you have to let your skin get used to the product.

author: Jyoti Barai
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

body: Smells good and have cooling effect but doesn't last longer

title: Safe way to keep you fresh all through the day

body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

Am loving it. such a remarkable product that works wonders for me 
It's very smooth to the skin, keeps out all terrible odours. Thank you Juicy chemistry for bringing out this goody

author: Namrata Sharma
title: Love it
body: Strong smell bit disappears a while after application. Easy to use. Love the cardboard packaging. Totally works in this humid climate

author: Karen Herbert
title: Will definitely repurchase
body: Easy to use, smells great and lasts all day.

author: Maleka Sameer Bhagat

body:
It is chemical free,does not leave any residue and smells and feels fresh
Only hurdle am facing is the use of the contents,have to push hard for the product to come to the surface

author: Preeti Saroha
body: Amazing product....keeps the underarms super fresh all day. I use it widout any guilt as it's free from alcohol. Fragrance is totally amazing. M gonna buy it again

author: MURPHY
title: Finally something that suits me
body: Have tried a few good organic deo sticks. Couldnt continue as they used to darken my underarms..  Have been using this 2 weeks now. Till now its going great.  Would love to see the Damask and Jasmine one back in stock and try it 😍

body: It's really very refreshing!!! Great product!!

title: Love organic
body: Just awesome no explanation needed its the game changer

author: Shaan V
title: Best
body: This one I find is the best among the three deodorant from juicy chemistry. Even after hours the fragrance stays even during the most hot and humid days. The other two are ok ok.

author: Aleena Maureen George
title: Super lasting
body: I do have big issues with body odour but this lasts a good 6-8 hrs straight suring my working hrs and that's like awesome for me

author: Mrs.Poonam
title: Deo stick
body: It's awesome.loved it to the core.no body odour.all day fresh underarms. 🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊

author: HEENA AGRAHARI
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Supreet Kaur Sabharwal
title: Awesome product
body: It is an awesome product as always. All the products that I have used so far are incredible.

author: geethu aravind
title: Love It
body: Keep my body order away all day and feels fresh. I'm never a deodorant person as im allergic to deo's but this one is truely skin friendly and kept fresh all day. love and do recommend it to all

author: Amruta Raut
title: I love it
body: It lasts me for a long time . It’s good for us and good for the environment because of its packaging..I love it

author: Manveenaa Bhasker
title: My partner loves it! :)
body: My partner has been using anti-perspirants for the longest time and I was super-worried about the side-effects, so I decided to buy him this. I was very worried that he would hate it because he's so used to deodorants. But as it turns out, he loves it! It keeps the odour at bay for a good 7-8 hours, after which he re-applies. It's also a great fragrance, for both men and women. It's organic, nice-smelling and perfectly healthy!

author: Reshma Ramesh
title: Excellent product
body: I used the deo in the morning and the smell lasted for the whole day. Would highly recommend this product.

author: Reshma Ramesh
title: Excellent product
body: I used the deo in the morning and the it lasted for the whole day..

author: Aparna S
title: Blood orange deo stick (small)
body: Long lasting buy yet little white cast after melting also. Would like to buy minis in other varients also please. Because it's travel friendly and the packing is really cute 😊

author: Gabriella Menzies
title: One of the best
body: Products are amazing !!!! With super natural ingredients and eco friendly packaging. Finally,a product that has it all.Not a single chemical ingredients.  The smell is strong and gorgeous.  But doesn't last for long .maybe 5 hours . But its natural ,and I'd choose this any day over 24 hour chemical deo

title: Great product
body: Fantastic formulation, super effective products. The packaging can be better especially due to summer product melted and cardboard packaging was unable to contain it.

author: Tanvi Kadam
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: shivani gupta
title: Deo stick dat sticks!!!
body:
Hi Juicy Chemistry,
The roll on deodorant stick is very effective. Since I workout i sweat a lot, which is not a problem but the bodily disorder has definitely been taken care of by the deodorant. Since i dint want to use any chemical based on a daily basis i found out about JC. Thanks a lot!! Big fan henceforth.

author: Dimple M K
title: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh
body: The texture of the deostick is amazing. It's balmy. The peppermint feels literally cool which was surprisingly amazing & refreshing. This product masks the odor well.

author: Ramya KR
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

body: I love the fresh scent that lingers all day. And the fact that it has no chemicals

author: Karamvir Kaur
title: Does its job very well
body: Its organic deodorant stick which has a pleasant aroma. Its safe for underarms and lighten the area. Gives fresh feeling. Go for it ladies🥰

body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Pareedhi N
title: The blood orange deo stick
body: The best one yet...I must say...it's a life saver..for people who hate mildest of scent

author: Haritha Sammeta
title: Very good
body: I never used a deodorant before as I normally stays indoor. This deodorant is very good I stoped sweating had a cooling effect on my underarms, May be because of not using chemical deodorants before .. I dint feel like my body need to adjust for organic deodorants or any bad sweat smell .. problem is that the fragrance fades away too soon. But I still like this one.

author: Sharon David
title: Amazing product!
body: This product is amazing! Well worth for the price as it lasts for a really long time! The smell lasts forever! I am super sweaty which hinders my confidence level however, this deodorant is doing an amazing job. The fact that it is organic means we can use it without worrying about any harmful side effects!

author: Dhruvi
title: Organic deodrant!
body: It not only has a good smell, but it is also very much good for the skin, unlike other deo's.

author: Priya Pawar
title: Just perfect
body: Oh what an amazing deo stick.Glides on the skin perfectly smells amazing,moisturizes the under arm area and the fragrance last long too. Loved it!

author: Sruthi P A
title: Great!!
body: This is one of the best products of JC. It worked well for me and leaves me fresh all day.

author: Neet
title: nice product
body: It’s great to have an option of a solid and natural deo. It smells kind of differently than you’d expect a deo to be but it does it’s job. It’s over all a good product! I’m new to JC and still testing out other products.

author: kanika sharma
title: love it!!!
body: it's my first purchase and I am sooo happiiieee!!!! the fragrance stays for good long time...safe on sensitive skin as well...even after waxing! would definitely go for another purchase since I am an ardent fan of citrusy fragrances 🥰

author: Khushboo
title: Thank God for JC!
body: An organic and chemical-free deo is a life-saver. I’ve always been extremely worried about the skin and texture of my underarms and was on the lookout for a good deo that soothes the skin but is without any chemicals. I can’t thank JC enough for making such products that are nature-based and make u happy using them. Plus the packing is great as it can be recycled.

author: latika Khandekar
title: Best product ever
body: First of all, I want to mention that I have used lots of JC products. From skin care to hair care to body care yes everything. All are A1 products. Highest quality and standards. I started with their cold pressed oils and from thereafter this brand never missed to amaze me. I am so obsessed by the skincare and wanted good organic cruelty free, skin and eco friendly products and JC came to the rescue. Earlier I could see the damage that other products had done to my face and JC gradually helped me to heal. You won't see results overnight but JC products will never disappoint you. I never thought that such products exist but yes they do. Love your products JC and keep it up. Good wishes and love.

author: Sangeeta uchil
title: deodorant
body: I did not want to use chemical deos and chanced upon this stick. Can't be happier after 6 months of using it. subtle fragrance, totally effective. Never going back to sprays. just got another one.

author: Richa Maheshwari
title: so good
body: I have thoroughly enjoyed this product. keeps the sweat in check. keeps odor in place. really good. will try damask rose version next time

author: Anonymous
title: Lovely fragrance and lasts the entire day
body: I loved the fragrance and smoothness of the balm on the skin. It's humid where I am and I was hoping this works well. And it did! The freshness remained throughout the day, no staining on clothes.

author: Malhotra
title: Not happy!
body: I can vouch for all the other products I have used from juicy chemistry but not their deodorant sticks. I’ve used two different flavours but I felt that it made my underarms darker. I tried using the second bottle but this for me was a total waste of money!

author: Tasneem Tinwala
title: a definite must have
body: this deo stick is one that you must hv in ur toiletry pouch. unlike other deos even after 12 hrs non stop the frangrance is the same.

author: Debadipa Mukhopadhyay
title: Loving it!
body:
After doing a stupid stint of using alcohol based deo on my underarms right after a waxing session, I got permanently irritated underarms. It would break out into terrible rashes every time an alcohol based deo would come even near it. I had to start using lemon juice to neutralize body odour. But even that was difficult to procure everywhere, since my job requires me to travel a lot.
I had been eyeing this product for a while and finally ordered it in. I was quite afraid about how my perpetually sensitive underarms would react to this. Suffice to say it is now my bff. However, I would also to like to mention that I have only been using it in the winter months. Let's see how it does during peak, humid Kolkata summers.

author: Ninad W
title: Solved my age old issue
body: I use this stick daily and it works wonders to control BO. In spite of a sweaty work-out in the evening, I continue to feel fresh. Love the balmy cooling feeling of the stick.

author: Eesha Meattle
title: Amazing
body: Effective, works well and applies really smoothly!

author: Steffi Samuel
title: Great product
body: Loved the fragrance, it helped to reduce underarm odour.

author: Stephie Chang
title: love the smell of it.
body: I'm not a fan of orange but this has a very mild fragrance. it will definitely go for a very long time.

author: Charmine
body: Absolutely loved this one ..a must have

author: Koel Ray
title: Loved these sticks!!
body: The smell is heavenly and stays through out the day. I like the packaging too. Love this product.

author: Ankita Dsouza
title: Amazing
body: It smells amazing and keeps smelling the smell for the whole day also a very good moisturiser for the skin and will keep using this

author: Thara .
title: i like it ❤
body: d fragrance s too good. happy to use an organic deo. but doesn't last long

author: jenny stark
title: amazing product
body: i love the smell and feel

author: Namita Jatia
title: Outstanding!!
body: One of my favourite and the best product by JC. Keeps you away from bad odour for 12+ hours and makes you feel fresh. One of the only brands that have stood upto the mark with their deostick. Thank you JC!

author: Jayalekshmi T S
title: Wow, unbelievable!!!
body: I never thought it could be effective but just wanted to try. It smells good. Really surprised by the results. Can’t live without one of the JC  ‘s deo sticks . Kudos to JC.If you are wearing light shades, beware of staining, gently massage the product till it is absorbed :-)

author: Rajesh Patel
title: The Chemistry is Working!
body: The product feels natural and safe and it works even in Mumbai weather! Thoughtful packaging, the container seems like it can be recycled. Would be good to see the actual Ecocert.

author: Shalini Jha
title: The best fragrance I have ever had!
body: I have a serious problem of migraine and cause of which i am very sensitive to fragrances. I cannot use perfumes at all and for ages was using the dove cucumber variant roll on. Can’t even use the deodorants as the smell just gives me a severe headache. Was looking for an organic deodorant and found this one out on Juicy Chemistry and I am blown away! I am using the blood orange and geranium version and this fragrance, ohh god! It has got me weak in my knees. I was a bit skeptical at first as it is made of oils and it might stain my clothes. But no, the smell lingers for a couple of hours and it doesn’t stain my clothes at all. It doesn’t stop sweating as the other roll ons available in market, but I actually wanted something which doesn’t block my sweat glands so I am happy with this. I hope you make soap and body lotions in the same fragrance 😬

author: Julie Iyer
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Tash
title: Amazing
body: Cannot go back to regular deodorant after this.

author: Pratibha
title: Long lasting fragrance
body: For the longest time I have been searching for natural deodorants. The range of natural deodorants (Yes, I have tried them all) are easy to apply and non-messy. These roll-on deodorants can also be used on the pulse points as they act as a solid perfume. They moved to a more sustainable packaging recently that ensures there is no wastage even after the product has been used. If you want to make that sustainable switch and use natural products, do give this deodorant a try.

author: Latika Singh chauhan
title: Review of Deos
body: The blood Orange deo I received this time is way different than the ones I got previously .. they smell different n colour is different too... they had a strong smell which I greatly appreciated n it suited me as well.. got compliments for it n thus ordered more to gift my friends .. but this time , the fragrance n colour both r mild n different .. hope u 'll look into it .. otherwise I have a strong admiration for you and your products .. thank u .. regards Latika

author: Lakyntiew Sawian
title: So far, so great!
body: It's been three days since I started using this deodorant. It's nourishing, and has left my underarms looking lighter because of the moisturisation; it's smell very refreshing and even keeps me smelling good after a heavy HIIT workout in the gym; and it keeps me fresh throughout the day. Best part is, no rash and no stinging upon application on freshly epilated underarms. Thrilled to have found an Indian skincare brand that I am proud of! Can't stop recommending JC to anyone who will listen.

author: Silvia Podder
title: Best Natural Deodorant Stick
body: In such a hot and humid weather, the deodorant actually works and keeps me fresh. I use it in the morning as well as in the evening. It's just the perfect deodorant stick with no aluminium and no harsh chemicals.

author: Surya Panicker
title: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick
body: Blessing for someone who struggled with body odour for years.

author: Hima Nair
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Geetika Kushwaha
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Rakhee Panchal
title: Bye bye body odour
body: My daughters and i love this product. The natural goodness and the fresh aroma. Only grudge is the mild stain it leaves behind on light coloured clothes. Hope you can find a solution to that.

author: Nithin Thambi
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Mohan L
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Gautam Deva
title: Deo and that too organic...win win
body: Well I had also purchased the Deo from them and I must say that I am very happy. The smell remains the whole day (regular office day work) and above all both the smells (bought both the options) are very refreshing and above above all its organic…the one I bought in the month of Nov is still going strong (today is 1st week of Feb)...

author: Poonam Chandiramani
title: Excellent Lip Balm and Deo Stick
body:
Excellent products.
Loved the Deo Stick in particular

author: Eva Eapen
title: Deodorant Stick
body:
This deodorant stick is made of magic! Honestly, it lasts for more than 24 hours, doesn't darken your armpits and I love the natural scent of this! <3 
It comes in natural packaging which is great - no worries about disposal affecting the environment! :) 
Bought this two months ago, I use it every single day and I still have almost half of the stick left! :)
It came with a sweet thank you note and I think it makes for a great gift too :)

title: Nice long lasting fragrance
body:
Nice long lasting fragrance
Product quality is very good as always ...ingredients used are good

author: Vaishali rawat
body: I like it a lot, lasts longer than simple moisturizers, but I wish it was still available in that stick packaging, it's also quite expensive

body: suits me well, like using it

body: suits me well, like using it

body: Body wash is best but deo is not so good need improvement.

author: Ritika Murthy
title: Good .
body: Best sustainable brand I have found so far

author: Sukhpreet K
title: Excellent product that could do with better packaging
body: The deodorant has a refreshing smell and stays for a Long time, longer that many spray deos. The only drawback is the packaging. Although environmentally conscious, the paper exterior does not do too well in hot, steamy bathrooms or if it manages to get a bit wet. The product itself is very good. I will definitely but it again.

title: Good
body: Good but on the higher price side

title: Very good
body:
Excellent product exceptfor the roll on 
packaging which is very difficult to push the deo up. In the process my deo broke

author: Sandya Devakumar
title: Good
body: First I would like to tell this provides good odour control. The texture is very crumbly like crunchy peanut butter. There is some burning sensation which lasts for about an hour possibly because of the essential oils. There is a lot of product wastage when I try to put on the lid.

author: Priyanka Doshi
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: Hello, this product is too good. Does the job of keeping underarm and other body parts fresh.

author: Deepa B
title: Review after second tube
body: Good smell, easy spread , absorbed well in a short time. But it's not long-lasting.  Fragrance goes off in maximum 2 hrs. Plz work on this issue. Reapplying isn't feasible

author: T.R.
body: This is one of the best deodorants I have used.Close to finishing my 3rd one now. The ONLY drawback for me would be that it leaves a faint stain on white clothing.

author: Antony lawrence
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodorant
body: A four star for the feel and the texture but pushing the deodorant is sometimes messy. I've just started to use it and so far feels good. It smells pleasant unlike a store bought one. I'll have to use it for at least a month to feel a difference. But, if it is anything like the Tamanu facewash, then it is going to be staple in my cupboard.

author: S.U.
title: Smells incredible ❤️🍊🌿🥰
body: I loved the fragrance this combo of orange & geranium deodorant stick. It’s very easy to use and non sticky product.

author: Srishti Makhija
title: Solid perfume
body: The fragrance is very fresh but doesn’t last though..

author: Bhanu Sharma
title: nice product
body: Overall blood orange deodrant is a nice product but I haven't seen any improvement in my skin tone.. plus I don't like the smell of orange too

author: N.B.
title: works as stated
body: I have been using this product past 2 years . it helps me with odour free all day and consistent use has improved my underarm skin tone. the product comes a long way too.

author: Axelle Defrasne
title: natural deodorant
body: Bought 3 deodorants, efficacy is good and the smell is also very nice and lasting, the only thing would be that it leave marks on dark clothes

author: Meenu
title: Blood orange and Geranium deodorant
body: Except for staining of light colored dresses, 4stars

author: Geetanjali Krishna
title: nice product
body: This is a handy product that I've used all summer this year. It has a lovely fragrance and works well for several hours. Love its ecofriendly packaging too. One little complaint -- one has to be sparing while applying it, as too much of it can leave marks on one's clothes

author: Pradipta Ghosh
title: Herbal deo
body: The deo is good, fights medium perspiration for 2-3 hours. The fragrance doesn't stay but that's fine with me, given the ingredients are chemical free.

author: jay xyz
title: i loved it
body: it's smell sooo good and refreshing

author: Priyanka Garg
title: Product is good.
body: Product is good but there have to be a good slide on as we have to push it back in the box from hands. Some product is wasted in this way and also this is not hygienic.

author: Shreya Vernekar
title: Deodorant
body: It's really nice kept my odour away for long tym

author: I.
title: Good product. The small container lasts a reasonable while.
body:
- Smells great but wish it was a bit stronger and lasted a little more longer. That is not to say it doesn’t last a decent while. 
- Can get grainy when applying on the skin under your arm and it shows, the particles are sticky and need dusting off especially if you’re using the small container Deo rather than the roll on. Can leave off white stain on clothes a bit but washable. Not sure I will have the guts to use if I’m wearing something sleeveless. 
- No change is discolouration under arm having finished one container (not the roll on). However, did not darken either. 
- Mild cooling effect that stays for about an hour
- Already purchased second bottle as I got the smaller size which lasts a decent while for the quantity and price I purchased for 
- Good option for the Indian summer heat and feels safer as it is organic
- I am worried about product build up in underarms hence try to scrub under arms (often as gently as possible) so no residue is left, leading to clogged pores
- Have not had as much issue with clogged pores in the under arms since using this deodorant so it appears to what it claims 
- Would probably prefer to other branded roll on deos
- Wish the lavender and ylang ylang scented deo from Juicy Chemistry was available in the small size glass container as well

author: Rajeswari Vemula
title: Best but!!!
body: Everything ok but they are staining the clothes

author: A.
title: Amazong product
body: I love the subtle scent and simply love the fact that it stays for long. Does not cause blackening of skin and is absolutely skin friendly

author: E.D.
title: good product
body: I have enjoyed using this product..the quantity should be a little more though

author: Malvika
title: Smells nice and is cooking, but not easy to glide
body: Smells light and pleasant, and prevents sweating and body odour.

author: a.m.
title: Very affective
body: Didnt work well for pigmentation. However does Deo job well. Odour free all day long

author: A.s.
title: Great natural option
body: Loved the deodorant and the smell is absolutely divine. Giving it 4 stars only because I felt that the texture is a little dry for me (powdery while applying after few uses). Would give 5 stars if they improve the texture!

author: Surbhi
title: Love it
body: Refreshing fragrance. Fragrance is like no other.

author: Kamaljeet Kaur Sandhu
title: It’s a nice Product
body: I recently switched to this organic deo stick and My underarms are thanking me for it . This product doesn’t irritates my underarm skin and provides decent odour control.

author: Adwait Ranade
title: Nice deo
body: Nice deodorant! Lasts long and doesn’t overpower in smell.

author: Devyani Rao
title: Disappointing
body: I had hoped the shower gel would have the same glorious fragrance as the deodorant but unfortunately, it doesn't. Doesn't lather well either. By JC standards, I'm disappointed.

author: Sakshi
title: Love the smell
body: Definitely a great product, the smell is great. The only issue is the product design. There's no way to put the deo dtick back in if you push it out too much. The consistency of the deo is not very smooth, but if you just rub the extra into your skin it's fine. Would recommend it.

author: Priya dharshini Ks
title: Good one
body: Good product... The other variants can be also in sample so that customer can try and buy them... Smell doesn't last long but it's good to use ..

author: Arpita Bhakare
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Shruti Nayyar
title: Works!!
body: Product is super. Improve packaging plz

author: Karishma Shivdasani
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Vidhi Bisani
title: One of the best
body: I started using the Juicy Chemistry deodorant about a year ago. The first time you smell it, you won't be very pleased. You'll eventually get used to the fragrance and so will your under arms. It takes time to work if you've been using the other roll ons like Nivea. The transition was great from a chemical base deo to a natural one. This might be a pricey one for the quantity, but it's worth it. Also, wash it off well during the shower cos it takes time to rinse off.

author: Neha sati
title: Nice
body: The deo stick is good , doesn't stop the sweating but definitely saves you from the odor.

author: Shagun Sinha
title: Nice and refreshing
body: It is a very nice concept of an organic deo stick. It is effective and does what it claims without leaving any stains. I am not a fan of the smell, which is too minty for my personal taste.

author: Taruna Rajpal
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Maanasi Chandrasekar
title: Good alternative to regular deos
body: Love the product and smell for the most part. Just don’t like that the product gets collected in crevices and becomes almost like flaky.

author: Nathan Shylaja
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Shilpi Jaiswal
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Kunal Ranka
title: Excellent Product with great notes
body: Loved the product, especially the notes of orange. Good to see a brand focusing on eco friendly product packaging. Just found difficulty in removing the deo stick from the container. You push too much and the stick doesn't go back. Otherwise an amazing product

author: Reshma M Balan
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Rahul Desai
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: SKINtellectual.Z
title: THE BEST NATURAL DEO STICK
body:
This was the first natural deo stick I had used and I am absolutely smitten by this product. I sweat a lot so its advantageous in a way that this product diffuses its fragrance beautifully on my skin. It easily lasts 5 hours on my skin and that's a pretty longwear considering it is organic.. I'm already on my third deo stick of this same variant because its the best fragrance and most long lasting and effective than other variants and not too overpowering at the same time.
CON- It has a gritty texture and it pills on the skin during application. (TIP- Swipe the product just twice, not more, and then work it in with a light hand. Avoid massaging harshly oresle the product will ball up and stain the clothing)

author: Janelle Alva
title: Can make do!
body:
Was super excited to try this range, ended up being a little disappointed. 
Pro's 
- Applies well and the smell lasts through it all. 
- Really appreciate the 8gms sample. 
- Smart packaging.

author: Soumyashree H S
title: Works
body: This natural Deodorant works on a normal day keeping odor ar bay for atleast a good 5 hours. Due to hygiene concerns I scoop the product off the tube and apply

author: Ankita chakravarty
title: Effective product
body: For a sweaty person it is helpful but the fragrance fades out after 3-4  hours...overall a good winter product

author: Saborni Poddar
title: Good fragrance, GREAT packaging
body: The balmy deo is very soothing and has an instant cooling sensation on application. As an added bonus the packaging is completely biodegradable! If there is one small downside to this product its the grainy residue post use.

author: Vidhi Raichura
title: Best product
body: Have been using this from past 1.2 month. The deo smell is really good and does controls the body odor. Keeps you smell fresh all time

author: Rasha Sharief
title: Natural Deo
body: Just switched from a traditional Deo to Natural, seems to work fine. Do wait for your system to get used to it if you switching from traditional to natural deo.

author: Suchi Mishra
title: I'm happy with my purchased.
body: Really I can feel the realness of products. I am loving it.

author: Apeksha Joshi
title: Amazing product!!!!
body: Does what it claims.. No BO even after a hectic day which certainly is a blessing for someone who has suffered from it since teenage.

author: Angad Chachra
body: It’s good to use but it’s too sticky, otherwise it’s long lasting and I am happy with the product

author: Dr Y Krishnabharathi
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: merlyn abraham
title: A must buy- if looking for an organic Del
body: Does it’s job and keeps the skin happy.

author: Shruti Pardeshi
title: Good
body: Good smell. 4 stars only because it's too strong

author: KrishnaPriya
title: Lovely product
body: This is the first time that I am using an organic deo. It is a very good product. You ll have a tingling or very minute burning sensation but that doesn't cause any other problems to your underarms. It ll go off once the deo settles down. you ll have to reapply after 5 or 6 hours unlike the chemical ones that can last upto 10 or 12 hrs. Loved the environment friendly packaging.

author: Savitha G
title: A good product
body: Love the deo. Gives a cooling effect. Stays for the whole day without any sweat odor.. Has lightened the skin in that area to some extent.

author: priti kohal
title: Good for sensitive. Skin
body: Product is very good for sensitive ,itching underarms .The fragrance does not last very long though

author: Simi Mathews
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: Moka
body: It’s not bad.. if you’re committed to changing to an organic, Eco friendly Deo then this works. Better than some other green brands out there.

author: Ammu
title: Effective but leaves stains on clothes
body: It's a very effective product with a lovely scent. The only issue is that it does leave greasy stains on clothing which don't come out easily.

author: Avani Patel
title: Packaging
body: I only issue is with the packaging. It needs improving as it is difficult to put the top on after use and if it is not shut properly then the product forms a crust on top.

author: DR
title: Lovely but stains clothing
body: This was my favourite deodorant till I figured out why all my clothes suddenly had stains. Such a pity. The fragrance is phenomenal.

author: A.V.
title:
I had also mentioned on one of your posts.
The orange underarm roll on.. has a very very strong a...
body: Plus the cardboad package imparts its bad smell to the roll on stick .. so the combined smell of orange and cardboard.. is very repulsive

author: Anisha Singh
title: Packaging isn't convienient to use
body: I kindly request you to improve the packaging of the product so that it can be more convenient to use.

author: Anonymous
body: Not that great.It doesn’t last long.

author: Shraddha Patankar
title: It's just ok
body: The deoderant isn't that great.... it's time consuming..... not ordering again

author: I.
title: smells good. fragrance lasts a while. stained/darkened arm pits.
body: All okay, but upon using my second jar (took the smaller option instead of the stick), I noticed it darkened/stained my arm pits which went away when I stopped using it and came back when I used again. I’m confused as that didn’t seem so prominent when I used the first jar.

author: Mokshha G
title: 😐
body: Though the stick was easy to use, I didn’t benefit much from the product. I sweat a lot and that combined with this product produced a different smell altogether. It was worth a try coz of its organic nature.

author: ASHLY ABIN
title: Deodorant
body: I have been using this deo for 3 months. It’s keeps The underarms fresh and odour free for hours . But I did not see any changes in my pigmentation or the darkened area getting lighter .

author: Nikhila R
title: Though a good initiative,Only good for 6 hours
body:
The product gives you a nice smell, but the product is good for only 6 hours 
Again you have to scurry to apply it again. The deo and body odour mix and give out a bad odour.

author: Shishir
title: Nice but stains clothes
body: I love that it is natural and the smell is amazing and lasts for 5-6 hours easy.

author: Sundararaj R
body:
Not worth the price of product.
Non organic cheaper product is much better in terms of price, quality and fragrance.

author: Ravleen Kaur Heer
title: Lightened my underarms but needs frequent reapplication
body: I love that it’s all natural and I’m not applying any harmful chemicals to my skin. It has helped a lot with my underarm pigmentation but being natural, i need to reapply it frequently as I have excessive sweating.

author: S.P.
title: does wonders
body: the product as such is amazing , great aroma but the stick is not good . need to I prove on the packaging . would have been better if it was a roll on where we could roll in and out . but in the current packaging we can push it out but cannot push it back in .. which leads to wastage .

author: Sneha Jain
title: Lasting power of deodorant
body: I found the deodorant to b just ok. My brother n bhabhi likes ur brans alot so I also gave it a try this time but somehow m not v happy with the deodorant. First of all it's not easy to apply it , also the staying power is less n I don't know but wen it mixes with sweat it creates a weird kind of odour so I'll don't know.

author: Rana
body: Orange fragrance too strong, doesn't look pleasent sometime. Add Yang Yang on top notes.

author: sudha niharika maddali
title: Deo review
body: The fragrance is not so heavenly it’s just fine. It doesn’t stay for long too

author: Sunakshi Garg
title: Blood Orange and Geranium Deodrant Stick
body: The product as such is good but it is quite difficult to use. The roll of the stick is not smooth.

author: Sanna Puri
title: Causes pigmentation in the underarms
body: Smells great and does the job but Causes pigmentation in the underarms

author: Sandhya Suri
title: Surprise!!
body: Was really taken aback by the size of the item. Was so tiny and is difficult to apply. The product itself is really good 😌

author: Poonam Soni
body: The packaging for the deo stick is not good. Uncomfortable to use. Products are overall very good.

author: akanksha paul
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Janavi Jangle
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Yasaswi Saraf
title: Blood orange and geranium deodorant stick
body: The product is nice. The smell is good. But it is not very long lasting. Also, the stick is very inconvenient to use given the make of it. Can lead to breaking or wastage very easily.

author: Nikki Thara
title: Not satisfied
body: It make armpits smelly and sweat even more before. And stick leaves a paste kind of creamy layer while using a stock

author: Ranjani Janakiraman
body: I am not sure if it is actually controlling the sweat.It's ok so far.

author: Simrita Singh
title: Good but not great
body: It is good but the smell is somewhat similar to a mosquito repellent…would have been better if there was no fragrance at all…the effect is not very long lasting still it’s ok…price wise very expensive…overall an OK product.

author: Ankita Pande
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Deodorant Stick to keep underarms fresh

author: Jaipreet Kaur
title: strong irritating fragrance and stiff  deo bottle
body: Big no no. will not ever buy it again

author: Jessica Schomberg
title: Fabulous
body: We love this as its a natural product and were also very impressed with the cardboard packaging. However this means it is a little hard to use the deodorant. Once we put the deodorant on we have to rub it in as it does form some little lumps otherwise. The smell is divine and it does a very good job as a deodorant.

author: Sharada Shankar
title: Product is good but shipping
body: This is the second time around I ordered and both the times I had to send them a reminder enquiry and also call as to when they are going to courier and the answer I received was the consignment was sent and the courier service sent it to the wrong place and so they will resend again which obviously seemed unbelievable as no courier service loses the address or whatsoever... Request you guys to update your way of work or else in the long run it will be very difficult to survive

author: Padma Ganesan
body: Blood Orange & Geranium Organic Deodorant Stick

author: kajal jawale
title: It is not long lasting
body: The deodorant is not long lasting . Smells like relief bam but I m using it as it is organic & it also help me for my dark underarms.. so I will definitely buy again also I will try some other products from juicy chemistry as they are providing organic products which is my 1st preference always . Thank you

author: uma magheswari
title: No results
body: No results to any extent in terms of lightening underarms

author: Parvathi Manojkumar Nair
title: Works Great; Scent not Pleasing though!
body: The deodorant works great, and lasts for a long time, but I don't sweat much so I guess I'd be the wrong person to ask, and it hasn't had a lightening effect yet.

author: Karpakam
title: Average
body: Product is ok...Serves the purpose if you don’t sweat too much.  It is better to apply with your hand soon after you shower..more hygenic that way...as the packing is rather not in sync with the product.

author: p.s.
title: Leaves yellow stain on white colored tops
body: The product does the job but it has left yellow stain on my white colored tops. Ruined it. Had to use bleaching agents to get it out which wrecked the fabric ultimately.

author: Kavita Gupta
title: Deodorant and hair serum review
body:
Deodorant is good
Hair serum - it’s causing hairfall

author: R.P.
title: Smells strong. Did not control odour.
body: It works for the first hour but post that it stops. After that, the fragrance mixes with sweat and makes me smell weird. Difficult to remove while showering (feels waxy).

author: S.S.
title: Residue issue
body: The fragrance is good...tunmbe n application is ok.. it's cardboard, so a bit flimsy need to be cautious while pushing product ...staying power is average.My issue is with whatever base being used (understand its organic) ..its so sticky and waxy ...stays on even after rinsing ..washing wz soap n scrubber ..not repurchasing. Have bought trial size ofctge cream product ..that has a decent light cream texture so have hopes for that ...

author: J.A.K.
title: Lookout
body: I have extremely sweaty underarms. And I do mean that. So even tho going deodorant free is suggested I simply cannot live without using deodorants. I've gone from using the classic Rexona to roll ons to antiperspirants sprays like Nivea pearl. And just knowing how bad they can be. Cancer causing extra made me look into natural deodorants. Which  is how I can across this particular one. It was a holy grail when I first tested it out. BUT then it caused such a bad burn  that the me that wanted to get rid of dark underarms is looking at an even worse picture here. And only one of my underarm is reacting like that. There goes my dream of a natural, not harmful deodorant.

author: M.J.
title: Deodarant
body: The soda bicarb in it didn't work for me. It severely irritated my skin.

author: V.P.
title: not satisfied
body: It has marks in clothes , however hard u run on skin plus it’s material is very sticky

author: Sandhra John
title: A big disappointment
body: I really had great expectations and hope of this deodorant as I had seen a lot of famous Indian YouTubers recommending this particular product. For me basically, it was a complete failure. Neither does it last for a long duration or  mask the odour, but in fact when I sweat it gives a very off putting talcum powder odour. Extremely disappointed and for sure will never purchase this product again.
